Authors:
Sarah Keating, Frank Bergmann, Ben Bornstein, Akiya Jouraku and Lucian Smith designed and wrote most of the software, with contributions from Gordon Ball, Bill Denney, Christoph Flamm, Akira Funahashi, Ralph Gauges, Martin Ginkel, Alex Gutteridge, Stefan Hoops, Michael Hucka, Totte Karlsson, Moriyoshi Koizumi, Ben Kovitz, Rainer Machné, Nicolas Rodriguez, and many others in the SBML community. Michael Hucka wrote most of this libSBML documentation.
